name: Sungsoo Ahn
content: Sungsoo AhnSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationAbout MeI am an assistant professor at the Graduate School of AI at KAIST. I lead the Structured and Probabilistic Machine Learning (SPML) Lab. I focus on developing machine learning algorithms for molecules, with applications to drug or material discovery. Contact: sungsoo.ahn@kaist.ac.krLinks: scholar, linkedin, CV (last update: 2025.08.17)Lab MembersRegulars: Minsu Kim (post-doc), Yinhua Park (post-doc), Yunhui Jang, Hyosoon Jang, Hyomin Kim, Seonghyun Park, Seongsu Kim, Kiyoung Seong, Minkyu Kim, Dongyeop Woo, Nayoung Kim, Hyunjin Seo, Taewon Kim, Yoonho Kim (incoming)Alumnis: Haeji Go, Juwon HwangPapersWorkshop / Preprint / OngoingSearch-Based Correction of Reasoning Chains for Language ModelsMinsu Kim, Jean-Pierre René Falet, Oliver Ethan Richardson, ..., Sungsoo Ahn, Yoshua BengioLearning Flexible Forward Trajectories for Masked Molecular DiffusionHyunjin Seo, Taewon Kim, Sihyun Yu, Sungsoo AhnCan LLMs Generate Diverse Molecules?
